duties_responsibilities.duty: Schedule and coordinate appointments, meetings, and events for the client.
Collect, sort, and manage incoming mail and correspondence.
Assist with walking and caring for two King Charles Cavalier dogs.
Run errands, including grocery shopping and other necessary tasks.
Provide transportation for the client to appointments as required.
Help the client stay organized by managing calendars, reminders, and to-do lists.
Anticipate and address the client’s needs efficiently.
Maintain a high level of confidentiality and discretion in handling sensitive information.
Assist with basic health monitoring, such as reminding the client to take medication and monitoring blood pressure.
Help oversee construction of Santa Monica beach house (main resident)
Note taking, and updating client as needed with reminders and appointments
